entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon except minus 8 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon except minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
